com.lps.service.basic

接口 BasicService<T>

  • 所有已知子接口:
    AdminService, BasicForServerOrderService<T>, ClockCategoryService, OrderStatusService, PayPathService, PledgeService, RoomService, ServerItemService, ServerOrderService, UserService, WorkRankService, WorkStatusService
    所有已知实现类:
    AdminServiceImpl, ClockCategoryServiceImpl, OrderStatusServiceImpl, PayPathServiceImpl, PledgeServiceImpl, RoomServiceImpl, ServerItemServiceImpl, ServerOrderServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl, WorkRankServiceImpl, WorkStatusServiceImpl

    public interface BasicService<T>
